column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If this review was for Texas I would give it a 5 star.  Lou Malnati's pizza is one of the best pizza's in Chicago.  The deep dish pizza is not oily
column2: has a crisp bottom crust and the sauce is perfect.  The choice of Mozzarella cheese is terrific and the sausage is blended with just the right amount of fennel seed
column3: not over bearing with just the right amount of seasoning.  The pizzeria makes some intelligent choices like allowing you to order while you wait for a table.  As everyone knows
column4: a good pie takes about 40 min to make
column5: so enjoy.  Chicago has some really good competition.
